title: Chatterbox TTS Multilingual
description: Zero-shot text-to-speech synthesis with emotion control and voice cloning capabilities by Resemble AI.

defaults.text: We're excited to introduce Chatterbox, our first production-grade open source TTS model. Licensed under MIT, Chatterbox has been benchmarked against leading closed-source systems like ElevenLabs, and is consistently preferred in side-by-side evaluations. Whether you're working on memes, videos, games, or AI agents, Chatterbox brings your content to life.

Estamos emocionados de presentar Chatterbox, nuestro primer modelo TTS de código abierto de calidad de producción. Con licencia MIT, Chatterbox ha sido comparado con sistemas cerrados líderes como ElevenLabs, y es consistentemente preferido en evaluaciones lado a lado.

Nous sommes ravis de présenter Chatterbox, notre premier modèle TTS open source de qualité production. Sous licence MIT, Chatterbox a été évalué par rapport aux systèmes fermés de premier plan comme ElevenLabs.
What a wonderful and absolutely amazing day it is today! The sun is shining brilliantly!
This is a clear, neutral speech synthesis example with balanced parameters for professional applications.
